name: Warehouse Inventory Scanner
description: Camera-equipped robot that patrols warehouse aisles scanning shelves and QR codes using Gemini 2.5 Flash vision
author: logistics_dave
use_case: Drives predetermined routes through warehouse aisles at night, photographing shelf labels and QR codes. Gemini vision reads labels and compares against expected inventory positions. Flags misplaced items, empty slots, and damaged packaging in a morning report.
